div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 15:53 pm CDT

div.div: A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly after 3am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 51. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph in the evening.
A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly before 11am. Cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly sunny, with a high near 70. South wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. South wind 7 to 11 mph.

div.p:
Tipton R-VI School District is requesting proposals for a Guaranteed Energy Cost SavingsÂ Project. The project will involve facility improvements including, but not limited to,
modifications or replacements of HVAC systems or facilities through a Guaranteed EnergyÂ Cost Savings Contract pursuant to Missouri Statute 8.231. Interested parties may receive
the RFP packet from Dr. Terry Robinson, Superintendent, via email atÂ robinsont@tipton.k12.mo.us. All proposals must be received by 12:00 noon CST onÂ 05/22/2020.

a.aria-label: Read more about REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS...
Read more about HOME & SCHOOL CONNECTIONS

div.p: DUE TO SCHOOL CLOSURE, MR. STINKY FEET HAS BEEN POSTPONED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...
Jim "Mr. StinkyÂ Feet" Cosgrove has been delighting audiences for over two decades with his highÂ energy, interactive concerts.
Come prepared to sing, dance, and have fun as weÂ celebrate music and reading! Check out Jimâs music and videos at www.jimcosgrove.com .

a.aria-label: Read more about MR. STINKY FEET....POSTPONED!!

div.p: THS Press created a BE KIND PSA to help our students remember the importance of being kind, being aware,Â and shining bright.
Christina Loganbill worked with the Shipley family, and created a digital story over the projected transformation of the Harrison School for her FCCLA project.

div.p:
Tipton Junior High & High School
March 12th, 2020
Monday: Â Ucm will be visiting on 3/16 from 12-2, Â in the cafeteria and then in Mrs. Kingâs office for RTI. Â
Â Â
Tuesday:
Wednesday: Â Juniors: Â Donât forget to get those NHS applications done and turned in!
Thursday: Â Pep Rally Tonight at 7 PM High School Gym!Â Doors open at 6:20 PM.Â Autograph session afterward!
FBLA Members going to state, you will be taking your test on Thursday so be ready!
Friday: Â NO SCHOOL on Friday 3/13.Â We will make-up that day on Thursday 3/19. Â
Girls Basketball Team will play Friday at 4:30 at the Hammons Student Center
_________________________________________________________________
Congratulations to Mandy Stover. She was selected as the Area 8 FFA Vice President last night. Great job!
It's time for the annual Cardinals Care dodge ball tournament!!! This year, our drive is for our active-duty military members! Entry to play is one item from the full list of items to donate. Dodge ball will be on March 18. Sign up your team with Mrs. Witte or Mrs. Fischer to play!
